TextLibrary.Text: Winter
Why do you attack us?
Why do you attack us?
Why do you attack us?
Why do you attack us?
Talking wolves? Now I've seen everything...
Talking wolves? Now I've seen everything...
Talking wolves? Now I've seen everything...
Talking wolves? Now I've seen everything...
Answer my question, two-legs. Why do you attack us?
Answer my question, two-legs. Why do you attack us?
Answer my question, two-legs. Why do you attack us?
Answer my question, two-legs. Why do you attack us?
I'm just trying to protect the Elves. This is their homeland! And since when does a wolf talk?
I'm just trying to protect the Elves. This is their homeland! And since when does a wolf talk?
I'm just trying to protect the Elves. This is their homeland! And since when does a wolf talk?
I'm just trying to protect the Elves. This is their homeland! And since when does a wolf talk?
I am a Winter Wolf.
I am a Winter Wolf.
I am a Winter Wolf.
I am a Winter Wolf.
That doesn't answer my question...
That doesn't answer my question...
That doesn't answer my question...
That doesn't answer my question...
It should. Winter Wolves have always been able to talk. We lived here on the Tundra long before the Elves came.
It should. Winter Wolves have always been able to talk. We lived here on the Tundra long before the Elves came.
It should. Winter Wolves have always been able to talk. We lived here on the Tundra long before the Elves came.
It should. Winter Wolves have always been able to talk. We lived here on the Tundra long before the Elves came.
Well, be that as it may, why have you moved so close to this city?
Well, be that as it may, why have you moved so close to this city?
Well, be that as it may, why have you moved so close to this city?
Well, be that as it may, why have you moved so close to this city?
Creatures from the north have invaded our homeland. We moved because there was nowhere else to go. We needed to find food.
Creatures from the north have invaded our homeland. We moved because there was nowhere else to go. We needed to find food.
Creatures from the north have invaded our homeland. We moved because there was nowhere else to go. We needed to find food.
Creatures from the north have invaded our homeland. We moved because there was nowhere else to go. We needed to find food.
If I can get rid of these creatures who invaded your home, would you move back there?
If I can get rid of these creatures who invaded your home, would you move back there?
If I can get rid of these creatures who invaded your home, would you move back there?
If I can get rid of these creatures who invaded your home, would you move back there?
We would like nothing better.
We would like nothing better.
We would like nothing better.
We would like nothing better.
Then show me where you live and I'll help you. Do you have a name?
Then show me where you live and I'll help you. Do you have a name?
Then show me where you live and I'll help you. Do you have a name?
Then show me where you live and I'll help you. Do you have a name?
You would find it hard to pronounce with your small mouth. Just call me Winter.
You would find it hard to pronounce with your small mouth. Just call me Winter.
You would find it hard to pronounce with your small mouth. Just call me Winter.
You would find it hard to pronounce with your small mouth. Just call me Winter.
